name: Unstable (temporary)
description:
this duuuuude is the only enemy that I have almost done lol

Backstory

Just went with the theme "unstable" (you can see why the name is temporary) and decided to make a simple arcade rogue-like. Also the second game in my life.

Controls

use WASD or arrow keys to move around
space to shoot
mouse to aim and click at stuff
